name: Gradle Wrapper Plugin
description: Example plugin demonstrating Gradle wrapper skills for Claude Code. This plugin provides basic Gradle project initialization and build capabilities.

skills.name: gradle-init
skills.description: Initialize a new Gradle project with specified project type and build script DSL
examples: Initialize a Java application with Groovy DSL
Create a Kotlin library with Kotlin DSL
Set up a basic Java library project

skills.name: gradle-build
skills.description: Build, test, and package Gradle projects
examples: Run ./gradlew build to compile and test
Execute ./gradlew clean build for a fresh build

skills.name: gradle-dependencies
skills.description: Manage project dependencies and view dependency tree
examples: Add a new dependency to build.gradle

skills.name: gradle-tasks
examples: List all available tasks with ./gradlew tasks
